post.body: we are up one pup for the puppy play date party. I will be bringing @preciouspierre's ninja poodle with me.
sending you all my warm and fuzzies. Hope she's okay!
You're welcome! Happy stalking. That's what I do there anyway. @dahcheet, I'm sorry : (
aaaah, thanks! I am still learning the lingo. I assume now I have to download this off of the Interwebs?? I am on it!
forgive me for asking, but what's GIMP?
no, the settings on Twitter. Sorry! Should have said that!
go to Settings and there is a link to add Twitter to your site. Click that, it talks you through it. It's easy!
More womano-a-womano action, and I see no reason why you can't rock the cage with your nunchucks.
I may be down. My friend has been trying to talk me into going for awhile now.
I will bring him in to play with Winston and you can pretend he's yours. @burghbaby, I'm telling ya, go with Jaws.
Hang on to it. I go through cell phones like .... well, like something that one would go through quickly.
that is AWESOME! I am so happy for you and your family! Congrats all around. Welcome little Vinnie!
I hit him with a thorozine blow dart walking over to the field.
are you trash talking jr.? Because I will let him lose on you, sans medication. We will see how brave you are then.
I don't know if that will make people want to watch, or make people want to kill themselves.
thanks! Let me know if you want to come on, maybe we can have a casual magic episode!
well, I wouldn't say that's something that I would never write ....
I am happy to share the wealth. Keep your mind receptors open around 5:30, I will beam you a margarita.
tamper??
hey, I have heard your singing on your favorite, Puff the Magic You Know What, and you aren't half bad!
I can assure you I am not in cahoots with your husband. But I will still make him cry if need be. I am flexible like that.
you betcha. I already made my assistant blush and hang his head. I am ready to move onto a new challenge!!
Oh, it's on!!
I may just take you up on that. If I do this, you bet your sweet bippy it's getting taped!
I will try to mix it up. Sometimes though, they just really capture what it is I am feeling. It's like they get me. Spooky!
is that directed at me? It's lolcats. And I love them. A little too much it seems.
how do I get in again?? I forget.
Well, that explains the velvet jacket and leather slippers. And that I nodded off to Masterpiece Theater.
Negative. Brown leather. What does that mean?
and cupcakes? We will probably want cupcakes.
Oh, I need much, much more wine than just this one glass. I am thinking of mainlining it.
I am going to look for you. And flackle you. Be prepared. I still have on my Gwar outfit.
beats the one I sent out this year. "Remember that $20 I owe you? You're probably never getting it back. Joyous Holidays."
the world is a safer place if I am NOT making cookies. That is my gift to my office this year, not baking.
the real question is, are you going to use it, or are you going to turn around and regift it? Since mine is Starbucks I am using it.
@dangreenwald, we are talking starbucks gift cards here. So sweet, really, but it makes me feel bad that I can't.
I didn't know that was your bar! The name should have gave it away. : )
it's the holidays, yo. I will be 'filling orders' after Christmas.
I a thisclose to telling the boss I am leaving and heading back. I will have a Cape Cod in your honor!!
I don't believe that they have been dating long enough for her to even determine if she was. Which just adds to the class.
@ChachiSays, I could call it New To You. Or, Second Hand Hoes.
Ya, eHarmony doesn't road test them for you first. I will tell you, her new hubby to be got a very low rating in a certian area.
I bet I don't get invited. Neither of them are a huge loss for me. The Daniels family is WAY better friends than they are!
This is the second time this has happened. I am starting to think I have really crappy friends.
I also feel warmly towards their friend Captian Morgan. And, I have been known to break bread with their cousin, Jim Beam.
Tried to clean my room and failed. Posted my party recap instead. Those things don't just put themselves up.
I was going to post pics of my fancyshmance party on my blog, but reviewing them, until I learn how to blur faces n'at, don't think I can.
I know what I'm doing when I get home. Going through the 300 pictures Ms. Fezza just sent me from the party Sat. nite. I'm sort of scared!
I like to put the 'me' in social media.
Okay. I got two fighters and a sponsor, in six minutes. I say let's get us some gym time, an MMA trainer, & some sweet trunks and do this.
Seriously considering chucking work and starting all female UFC fighter troupe.
My coworker brings in bagels at least once a week. He did it again this morning. It's making me feel lilke I need to step up my bagel game.
I do not want to go to work today. I want to turn on my tree lights and snuggle up on my couch with my dog and watch Will Ferrell movies.
I am still in recovery from that game. My heart! Oh, and last night's party. It's couch time, and early bed for me! Getting old is hell.
Ha ha, my nephew said "T.O.? More like B.O.!" Right on.
So. Party ended at 6 am. I am way too old for this. At my mom's now to draw names for gift exchange, and want to be dead. Or asleep.
Layoffs at Yahoo and NPR. Tribune bankrupt. S&S layoffs. And they are axing Day to Day (tear). It's hard out here for a geek.
Leon is going to be a big bro soon! Just foud out my friend's pug Bella is preggers. I am going to have a pug pup! Taking name suggestions.
Citizen Cope channel on Pandora = da bomb. Swoon.
Sweet christ on a crab cake. Our vending machine now has Whatchamacallits. Goodbye diet, I barely knew thee ...
Altho, starting a service that matches people up w/used phones & depriving Verizon of making money of off them, I would totally do that.
Social Media got me a new (to me) cell phone, so I can take back the one I had to buy yesterday, and Verizon can SUCK IT. Thx @DjLunchbox!!
I am trying to figure out how I feel about this muffin. Ginger carrot. Lots of fiber. Would probably be better wrapped in bacon.
Woke up with a cold, but not enough to get me down. The closer we get to Christmas, the more unbearable I am going to be. You are warned.
This is why I currently hate Verizon Wireless : www.mindbling.blogspot.com. I'm glad I have my blog, because I can't afford therapy now.
Happiness is a warm, tired puppy.
Pugglepalooza @chris_lugo's was amazing! Except Leon pooped on his floor. I, however, did not.
Verizon wireless is the devil!
Dear Demon Clock, Run faster. Kthxbai.
I am off to the Omni for a holiday party that includes, as I may have mentioned, an open bar. That's free booze. Ya'll have a good night!
Just hear those sleigh bells ringle and ting-ting-tingling, too. Come on it's lovely weather for an open bar together with yoooooouuuu.
T-minus one hour till party time with open bar!! I love the holidays.
If I die with the words 'pin up', 'icon', and '85' after my name, you can bet your sweet ass I died happy.
Christmas caroling is on for Friday, the 19th. If you want to get into the Christmas spirit(s), DM me your email address. And visa #. Thx!!
I was in such a goodmood this morning, and now, I am not going to be happy until I make someone cry.
Just had to call out my assistant for CCing my boss for no reason. Don't try to make me look bad, yo. I do that just fine all by myself.
Good mood from earlier? Gone. That was fast.
My event yesteray got muy press coverage, so the boss loves me. Today. This could actually change by lunch.
Happy Friday. Let's all hope this one goes fast. I need this weekend to shop, as I have a grand total of two gifts thus far.
I missed an entire day on Twitter. Damn work. Let me know if I missed anything good.
Nice, slow morning. Don't have to be anywhere until a ten am client event. I will somehow find a way to still be a few minutes late.
Writing a brochure insert for an industrial cleaning company is putting me in a very, very bad mood right now.
I am supposed to be doing work stuff, but then I accidentally started blogging. Whoops!! My bad.
And now I am doing work that I had to bring home. Someone stop me! This is too much fun! But it's cutting into my working out time. Ha ha.
I just fell sleep on my recliner for an hour. Feet up, lightly snoring. Like an old man. It is hard to be this sexy.
Just stashed jr.'s Xbox, cables for Live, & Madden '09 in my room. Hiding for Xmas. This will probably be the night my house catches fire.
When you get stabbed in the back, sometimes the only thing to do is pull out the knife, turn around, and cut a bitch. Just saying.
We just had our holiday lunch, and I am sitting at my desk with a glass of red wine.
Does anyone else have a coworker that buys EVERYONE in the office a gift, thus making the rest of us look bad? B/c I do. And she just hit.
Why yes, yes @preciouspierre, I believe I will join you at Jacks. Also, just saw Transformers for the first time. I want to marry Megan Fox.
Well, since I am going to be childless, and I had enough of my family last night, time to investigate which bars are open today.
Jr's dad is on his way over to pick him up. Sigh. This is my least favorite part of Christmas.
I hope that everyone is enjoying their Christmas morning. Unless you don't celebrate Christmas; just enjoy your day off!!
Santa brought the Xbox, and jr. is up and playing Live. 'Loligager' is in Madden '09 heaven if anyone wants to join him.
Just cracked the Blackberry Merlot, put Elf on the TV, and now will commence to wrapping all of jr's gifts.
Nothing say Jesus is the reason for the season like me blowing out of work hours early to have a few drinks.
The two vodka and cranberry lunch I just had was delish.
Just found out my exbestfriend and exboyfriend got engaged. To each other. Merry Christmas!!
To me, the holidays are really about The Charlie Daniels Band.
My boss is so cute. He was just in here like "Oh, let's meet to talk about work stuff", and I was all like, "Go eff yourself."
